node.sales_desc: Save both space and money when you decide you want a spring under your antenna. Instead of buying a stud mount and a spring as individual components, you can buy one part and have it all. The springs are made of stainless steel for many years of service. Two basic models (ring terminal connections and screw-on connection), each available in a medium duty model and in a heavy duty model, are available. Each spring stands about 3 inches (77mm) above the mount surface. The medium duty models are great for 2 ft Firestik & Firestik II antennas as well as 3ft FireFly and Road Pal antennas. The heavy duty models may be used with any antenna up to 5 ft in length.

node.display_name: Firestik II FS Series CB Antennas
node.long_desc: Whip antenna;5/8 wave;Easy tune;Rugged solid-fiberglass core;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you took the proven features and performance of the famous KW" series antennas and added a unique tuning mechanism to the top, you would own the equivalent of a Firestik II, "FS" Series antenna. Aside from the ease of tuning, the patented design broadens the antennas bandwidth to keep SWR lower over more channels. The upper coil extension also increases the power handling capability of the antenna. All "FS" antennas are compatible with autos, trucks, vans, motorcycles and ATV's in a single antenna configuration when metallic ground plane is available. Or, they may be used in dual (co-phased) configuration on any vehicle made from any type of material. Like all CB antennas, the "FS" antennas should be fine-tuned (SWR) in their final mounting location. If you have ever tuned a non-tunable tip antenna, you will have a real appreciation for the "FS" antennas. To tune a "FS" antenna, you just pop-of the tip and turn the adjustment screw up or down as needed. All "FS" antennas exceed the requirements of any CB radio, new or old. Aside from the hi-performance loading coil that maximizes the transmit/receive functions of your CB, these top-loaded antennas will also receive the NOAA emergency weather alert and national weather broadcasts for radios with those features. The "FS" antennas are 100% American made with 100% American materials. To maintain a balance between flexibility and ruggedness, we use a custom blended, glass fiber reinforced shaft. Each is wound with heavy insulated copper wire to prevent the oxidation and shorted windings often found on non-Firestik antennas. The tunable tip mechanism is made from rust-proof brass and has a rubber o-ring to hold the adjuster in place after tuning. Our 3/8"-24 threaded base has a tapered contact point that works especially well with Firestik mounts and accessories. The tapered "lug-nut" effect transfers stress away from the threads and reduces the possibility of vibration induced loosening of the antenna in its mount. E"

node.long_desc: The Dana Spicer Open Differential Internal Kits are forged to ensure greater strength and durability;Spicer internal gear kits offer a phosphate coating on the cross shaft and a statistically controlled heat treating;Dana Spicer open differential internal kits replace all of the internal components of your standard open differentials;These kits will eliminate clunking caused by worn spider gears and tighten up those sloppy differentials;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Get everything you need to rebuild your differential case with genuine Spicer inner gear kits. Forged to ensure greater strength and increased durability, these are only inner gear kits that are engineered to meet the standards of Dana, the global leader in drivetrain components. Each component of a Spicer inner gear kit is engineered to exact Dana specifications. In addition, you can get performance without the stress risers that come from cutting gears. Spicer inner gear kits are one of the many repair solutions designed specifically for high-performance applications. Wherever limits are pushed, on the track or on the trail, Spicer parts are there.

node.display_name: Fast Fuel Systems EZ-EFI Self Tuning Fuel Injection System Jeep CJ/YJ 4.2L w/ Inline Fuel Pump
node.long_desc: The K&N Electronic Carburetor Injection, or ECI, is a bolt-on system that adds a supplemental fuel source to your engine. The system consists of a carb spacer plate with a fuel block and injector, an ECU, and a wide band O2 sensor. The plate has a provision for the fuel injector. When needed, the injector squirts atomized fuel into the air stream passing through the spacer plate.
node.sales_desc: The K&N Electronic Carburetor Injection, or ECI, is a bolt-on system that adds a supplemental fuel source to your engine. The system consists of a carb spacer plate with a fuel block and injector, an ECU, and a wide band O2 sensor. The plate has a provision for the fuel injector. When needed, the injector squirts atomized fuel into the air stream passing through the spacer plate.In a way, the ECI system works like an EFI system that reads the air/fuel ratio fed to it from an included O2 sensor that you install in your exhaust. Where this differs from EFI, is that it is used in conjunction with the carburetor. Any time the system detects a lean condition, the injector will kick on to bring the AFR back to spec, but the engine is still fed primarily by the carb. The ECI acts as a supplement to your existing carburated setup, rather than a complete replacement system such as EFI or TBI.The brain of the ECI system is the ECU, which vigilantly monitors the input from the oxygen sensor to ensure an optimal air-to-fuel ratio is maintained. If the system detects an AFR higher than the user-defined limit, the injector will fire. Unlike a typical electronic fuel injection system, the ECI works cooperatively with your existing carburetor, supporting the fuel flow rates that high-horsepower vehicles require to operate efficiently. If your engine is performing lean, K&N's ECI system will help make up for the fuel deficit.While users can opt to set only basic parameters if they choose, other more specific parameterslike injector pulse width, shot volume, progressive injector firing, and minimum/maximum RPM rangeare all alterable, making the system extremely versatile. K&N Electronic Carburetor Injection (ECI) BrainK&N Electronic Carburetor Injection (ECI) Installed K&N's Electronic Carburetor Injection is very easy to install and can be done in a matter of hours, not days like some EFI kits. The three major components are the spacer plate with injector, the ECU with

node.sales_desc: Pro Comp Suspension?s new U-joint style drive shaft?s are the perfect upgrade for 2007 - 2008 Jeep JK 4WD vehicles with 2? or more of lift. When lifted, the driveline angles are increased, which increases the potential for driveline vibration. Pro Comp U-joint style drive shaft?s will allow for vehicle operation in 4WD at speeds above 25 mph. The factory drive shaft ball and cage design joint is replaced with #1310 style u-joints to allow for a stronger engagement, increase the range of motion, and improve seal and driveline life. Exclusive yokes, not flange adapters, are used to allow for a longer drive shaft, unlike our competitors versions. Pro Comp Suspension front drive shaft?s are constructed from 2.00? x 0.120? DOM (drawn-over-mandrel) steel tube. Kits come complete with necessary mounting hardware.

node.sales_desc: The best just got better. Straight from Pro Comp is the latest in the Robby Gordon Signature Series line, the new MX6 Reservoir Shock. Based on the original MX6 it's the only monotube reservoir shock on the market with six way external adjustability. Simply turn the one piece billet adjuster to your desired setting and go. This 2 monotube shock has anodized aluminum bodies and is nitrogen charged to 300 PSI. We've improved upon the MX6 design by adding a 10 anodized aluminum reservoir. It also features high quality parts like, gun drilled 14mm hardened chrome shaft, 4000 PSI 6 braided stainless steel hose, precision 46mm single piece banded monotube piston and one piece anodized billet cap. Race inspired and built to take anything you can throw at it.

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 91000 Series Single Sensor OBDII Compliant Universal Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 55000 Series Direct Fit Catalytic Converters
node.long_desc: Designed with ease of installation in mind, MagnaFlow's direct-fit converters are the perfect compliment to your OEM exhaust system. With no welding, cutting or bending required, you can easily add one of our direct-fit converters to your vehicle when it's time to replace your original catalytic converter. Whether your original converter has gone bad or you're just looking to upgrade to something more performance oriented, MagnaFlow's direct fit converters are just right. Featuring a ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, each converter features a stainless steel body and heat shield and contains a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Best of all, our 49-state direct-fit converters are in compliance with EPA guidelines so getting a car smog checked is a worry free task.;California Residents: WARNING"

The Main Frame tube comes 40-7/8 inches to fit stock Tacoma frames but can be trimmed down to fit various other applications. These parts are shipped Raw, and require welding for installation.

node.long_desc: To build a dual transfer case, two reductions boxes are bolted back to back with a dual case adapter. These two are then bolted to a 4wd section. One year warranty.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Trail Gear Trail Safe Knuckle Ball Wiper Seals
node.long_desc: The Trail Safe Knuckle Ball Wiper Seal is a double sided seal that keeps grease in and dirt out, all while eliminating the use of the OEM felt and rubber. Since it is made from seal-grade polyurethane, not UHMW, the seal is pliable enough to stretch over the knuckle ball during installation. This eliminates the need to cut the seal for installation which allows water to enter the knuckle ball and for grease to escape;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Trail Gear Trail-Creeper Ring and Pinion Gears
node.long_desc: Trail Gear's Trail-Creeper gears are made from tool-grade 8620 steel and heat-treated for maximum strength and wear resistance. The gear teeth are cut using Gleason CNC hobbing machines & cutters. Gleason gear-cutting technology produces an unprecedented level of accuracy and surface finish, which allows the gears to transmit more torque and improve fuel efficiency. The higher accuracy and surface finish also produces a quieter-running gear set, which means they will work great on the daily driver too.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Trail Gear TG High Pinion Housing
node.long_desc: A High Pinion differentials are the strongest eight inch differentials that Toyota ever made, the only problem was that they are also the most expensive and the hardest to find. High Pinion differential housings are usually the best solution for fixing drive line angle issues, as the pinion is several inches higher than a standard 4cyl or V6 differential housing, and is also much stronger because it uses a reverse cut ring gear that runs on the stronger side of the gear when used in a front axle. Trail Gear's high pinion housings are 100% new and no core is required, they come with all the necessary hardware, caps, cap bolts, adjuster wheels, lock tabs, and lock tab bolts, they even throw in the oil slinger.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: A High Pinion differentials are the strongest eight inch differentials that Toyota ever made, the only problem was that they are also the most expensive and the hardest to find. Trail Gear's high pinion housings are 100% new and no core is required, they come with all the necessary hardware, caps, cap bolts, adjuster wheels, lock tabs, and lock tab bolts, they even throw in the oil slinger.

The TG Battery Box will keep your battery where you want it, even on the toughest rocks and trails. We have all seen the results of batteries not held in place securely, or held in place by bungie cords: fire and sparks. The TG Battery Box can either be welded or bolted into place. It is made out of 1/8 inch thick steel and is shipped unpainted. Once the TG Battery Box has been mounted you simply remove the three bolts and the top lifts off and allows you to remove or install the battery in minutes. The TG Battery Box can either be mounted where your OEM battery was, or, due to its inchflat back inch design, it can be mounted behind your seat or cab. Also present on the TG battery box are 9 mounting holes in the bottom for ease of installation. The TG Battery Box works with Diehard Platinum and Odyssey DT 34/78 size batteries.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Trail Gear Samurai Trail-Creeper Transfer Cases
node.long_desc:
Do you want low gears without the hassle of rebuilding your transfer case? Let Trail-Gear install our 6.5 transfer case gear set into your 1986-1995 Suzuki Samurai transfer case. We dissemble your t-case, clean and scrub everything. We clearance the housing as needed and install our 6.5 gear set. All new bearings and seals are installed. The stock front output gear is upgraded to the later, heavy duty version to prevent front end slipping. A new shifter seat is installed for smooth shifting.

To send in your case for rebuilding, drain all the oil out of the case and remove the shift handle. Wrap the case with rags or a towel to absorb any residual oil. Then cover with at least 1 inch of bubble wrap. Place the wrapped case in to a box. Please include your full name, address, and phone number inside the box. Then place your order by calling or clicking on the shopping cart below. Ship your transfer case to us. We will install our low range gears and then we pay the return shipping to your door. Price includes a $200 core charge.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Do you want low gears without the hassle of rebuilding your transfer case? Let Trail-Gear install our 6.5 transfer case gear set into your 1986-1995 Suzuki Samurai transfer case. We dissemble your t-case, clean and scrub everything. We clearance the housing as needed and install our 6.5 gear set. All new bearings and seals are installed. The stock front output gear is upgraded to the later, heavy duty version to prevent front end slipping. A new shifter seat is installed for smooth shifting.

To send in your case for rebuilding, drain all the oil out of the case and remove the shift handle. Wrap the case with rags or a towel to absorb any residual oil. Then cover with at least 1 inch of bubble wrap. Place the wrapped case in to a box. Please include your full name, address, and phone number inside the box. Then place your order by calling or clicking on the shopping cart below. Ship your transfer case to us. We will install our low range gears and then we pay the return shipping to your door. Price includes a $200 core charge.

node.long_desc: This is the perfect taper reamer for reaming out Toyota and Suzuki pitman arms for the larger, more commonly used FJ80 tie rod ends, like the ones offered in our popular high steer kits. node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust Direct Fit HI-Flow Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: Designed with ease of installation in mind, MagnaFlow's direct-fit converters are the perfect compliment to your OEM exhaust system. With no welding, cutting or bending required, you can easily add one of our direct-fit converters to your vehicle when it's time to replace your original catalytic converter. Whether your original converter has gone bad or you're just looking to upgrade to something more performance oriented, MagnaFlow's direct fit converters are just right. Featuring a ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, each converter features a stainless steel body and heat shield and contains a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Best of all, our 49-state direct-fit converters are in compliance with EPA guidelines so getting a car smog checked is a worry free task.;California Residents: WARNING"

MCE Fender Flares have an aggressive, true flatty fender look;Provides more clearance for taller wheels and tires than factory flares;Made from durable TPO plastic MCE Fender Flares are tough and will not sag or crack yet flexible enough to absorb any impact on the trail and save your Jeep's body;OE-like black surface texture flares look great right out of the box or can be painted for a custom look;MCE Flares are available in 3, 4.5 or 6 inches of tire coverage;Made in the USA and backed by a NO fine print lifetime warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
MADE IN THE USA

Our fenders blend the aggressive, true flatty fender look of the original Jeep to the more modern Wrangler. Our fenders also provide more clearance for a taller tire and more aggressive looks. The MCE-spec TPO plastic will not sag or crack and isUV-stable. A common problem with rigid metal fenders is transferring energy to the Jeep's body, and denting the panel the flare is attached to. MCE flares are flexible enough to absorb an impact on the trail and save your Jeep's body.

Gen II fenders are black in color with an OE-like surface texture, while the Gen III flares are glossy smooth with a realistic carbon fiber look (Flexible Carbon Fiber"). MCE TJ and YJ front fenders are installed over a trimmed OE fender, so the inner fenders and the accessories mounted to them remain untouched. A paper cutting template and instructions are supplied with the fenders.

Our material is so strong, our fenders have a NO fine print LIFETIME warranty to the original buyer against cracking. Cold weather, off-road use, etc. does not affect this warranty."

node.long_desc: W/ DynaFact Thermocouple; CAN Equipped Vehicles;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: No other device on the market can match what we've put into the Banks iQ. This powerful micro-computer lets you know the inner workings of your vehicle's ECU letting you see what's beyond your dashboard gauges. You select what you want to see and how you want to see it. Set alarms, adjust gauge colors, read and clear codes, log data, and find out how quick your vehicle really is. You'll find yourself using the host of useful built-in tools in your daily life. You'll listen to your favorite tunes, watch videos, play games, review your Microsoft Office documents and more. It's PC power that fits in the palm of your hand, and with a rechargeable battery you can take it with you wherever you go. Compared to Banks iQ, other vehicle interfaces on the market are one-dimensional toys with an umbilical cord to your dashboard.

node.long_desc: Black Sidewall;Dirt Commander is a new all terrain tire, super tough 8-ply rated bias tire with excellent puncture resistance;Siped (grooved) tread design also gives additional biting edges, better traction in all terrains;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: GBC Motorsports Performance ATV tires are built to get you over tough terrains to your destination. Dirt Commander, GBC's new all terrain tire, is a super tough 8-ply rated bias tire that gives you excellent puncture resistance. Its siped tread design also gives additional biting edges for better traction in all terrains.

node.long_desc: Black Sidewall;The Dirt Devil is GBC's best selling ATV Tire of all time;Its directional tread design was developed to provide exceptional traction in dirt, gravel, hard pack & light mud terrains;Lugs are dimpled with more biting edged for better traction & reinforced for stable & durable footprint;Built with 6-ply rated carcass, the Dirt Devil also provides superior durability & puncture resistance;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Dirt Devil, GBC's best selling ATV tire of all time. Its original directional tread design was developed to provide exceptional traction in dirt, gravel, hard pack, and light mud terrains. Each lug is dimpled with more biting edges for better traction, and reinforced for a more stable and durable footprint. Built with a 6-ply rated carcass, the Dirt Devil also provides superior durability and puncture resistance.

node.long_desc: One of the newest and most innovative tire tread design on the market today;Dirt Tamer ATV Tires have lugs that cover most of the side of the tire giving this tire an unusual look as well as extra grip when sliding and turning;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The popular Dirt Tamer is a proven favorite for all utility riders. The bold non-directional tread design has excellent traction in all types of terrain and conditions. This heavy-duty 6-ply rated tire offers serious puncture resistance and its tread lugs run deep into the sidewall for added protection. The Dirt Tamer is heavy on performance, and also light on your wallet.

node.long_desc: 25-8-12, GBC RADIAL GRIM REAPER;Max Load = 450;Tread Depth = 28/32;Overall Diameter = 25;Black Sidewall;Combines an aggressive tread pattern with deep wrap around shoulder lug to give you uncompromising performance and traction;This new 8-ply rated all terrain Radial is constructed with a zig zag center ridge line, for superior puncture resistance and enhanced rider comfort;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Grim Reaper combines an aggressive tread pattern with deep wrap-around shoulder lugs to give you uncompromising performance and traction. This new 8-ply rated all-terrain radial is constructed with a zig-zag center ridgeline, for superior puncture resistance and enhanced rider comfort. GBC Motorsports carries a wide line of performance ATV tires for all types of terrains and riders.

node.long_desc: Hitachi Long Starter;153/168 Tooth Flywheel; 180 ft. lb. Torque; 3.7-1 Gear Reduction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: There are several choices when it comes to buying a performance starter. Powermaster has a wide range of choices to fit just about any application. Narrowing the choices down to exactly the right unit can be accomplished in three steps:Step 1:Torque Requirements-Speaking in general terms, a over 12:1 compression or higher engine should use a 200 ft.lb. starter. Engines up to 12:1 should use at least a 180 ft.lb. starter. 160 ft.lb. starters are good for engines up to 10.5:1.Step 2:Fitment-Consider headers, oil pans, and the mounting points on the engine and what size ring gear do you have.Step 3:Weight-Lastly, depending on the form of racing, the overall weight of the starter is a consideration.

node.long_desc: The Powertrax No-Slip Traction Systems are the latest design in traction-adding differential technology. They combine the smooth operation of a limited-slip differential with the traction performance of a locking differential. A precise synchronization mechanism eliminates the ratcheting sounds typical of other locking differentials. Installation is simple because no ring and pinion setup is required. In addition, no special tools or oils are needed.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Powertrax No-Slip Traction Systems are the latest design in traction-adding differential technology. They combine the smooth operation of a limited-slip differential with the traction performance of a locking differential. A precise synchronization mechanism eliminates the ratcheting sounds typical of other locking differentials. Installation is simple because no ring and pinion setup is required. In addition, no special tools or oils are needed.

node.long_desc: Available in Natural or Polished finish;Bolt on installation;Uses same belt as the factory;Delivers up to 50% more output at idle;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Just by adding a few electrical accessories such as driving lights, auxiliary cooling fans, or a mega-sound system you can quickly exceed the capacity of your Jeep alternator. POWERMASTER has the solution - high output alternators that bolt in place of the OEM alternator. They feature a slightly larger case that bolts to all factory brackets and use the same belt. POWERMASTER has reengineered the power curve to deliver up to 50% more output at idle. Every POWERMASTER high output alternator is tested and comes with a proof of performance tag.

node.long_desc: The original locking differential;Outstanding value;Completely replaces stock differential;Reuses your vehicle's existing carrier;Includes Zytanium cross shaft;Fully automatic operation for ease-of-use;Case not required;Does not alter ring and pinion;Works for both front or rear or in tandem;Thorougly tested to provide solid, reliable performance;Bolt-in installation;No gear resetting or shimming required;Available in 22, 26, 30 and 31 spline configurations;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Powertrax Lock-Right Locker offers the performance of a solid spool axle but allow for automatically un-locking for full turning capability around town or on the trail. This partricular locker also reduces annoying noise during operation and costly tire wear. Moreover, the Powertrax Lock-Right Locker also helps to prevent accelerated drivetrain damage. Lastly, the locker can be installed with common hand tools in under a few hours. However, note that a carrier is not included.

It has been widely used in demanding off-road applications around the world requiring extreme traction output and high-strength.

Because the Lock-Right Locker eliminates wheel spin-up, it also removes the unecessary shock that can transmit to associated driveline components. The product of this design is that the strength and integrity of the locker's original case is improved, which helps to keep your vehicle on the road. Cases that occasionally fail with open or limited-slip/posi differentials become one of the strongest links in the drive train when equipped with the Powertrax Lock-Right Locker.

The Lock-Right Locker has been used in the harshest conditions around the world by hard-core off-roaders, in towing applications, and even United Nation vehicles in rugged terrain.

For traction output, strength and durability, the POwertrax Lock-Right Locker. rivals much more expensive competitive lockers sold only as complete case replacement assemblies. It is a leading product because the Lock-Right delivers as much traction output, its end assembly is exceptionally strong, is much less expensive, and does not require professional installation (because the complete case assembly does not have to be replaced and realigned with precision calibration equipment).

An excellent choice for off-road vehicle applications, performance enthusiasts also began using the Lock-Right Locker to satisfy their extreme traction requirements for racin

node.display_name: Rubicon Express Oil Pan Skid Plates
node.long_desc: Rubicon Express has everything you need to protect the vulnerable undercarriage of your Jeep Wrangler JK from front to back, with skid plates for your engine oil pan, transfer case, and fuel tank. All of the skidplates are CNC laser cut from 3/16-inch steel to withstand even the worst abuse, and are designed to mount up tight to the drivetrain to maximize ground clearance. The modular protection system allows you to add skidplates as your needs and budget allow without any concerns about compatibility.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Developed and tuned specifically for each application;Deliver maximum control while not compromising ride quality;Robotically welded;14mm steel piston;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty monotube shocks help you get the most out of your suspension. These robotically welded shocks are specifically calibrated and tested to provide your vehicle the best possible ride both on and off-road. Their monotube design provides excellent heat dissipation and their large, digressive piston offers responsive control. Their 14mm nitro steel piston rods won't chip or peel like chrome rods can, and their multi seals and low-friction piston rod bearings ensure longevity. Urethane bushings add durability to these Rubicon Express Extreme-Duty monotube shocks. If you're looking for consistency, strength, and performance both on and off the trail, look no further than Rubicon Express!

node.display_name: BD Diesel AutoLoc Torque Converter Lock-Up Controllers
node.long_desc: Works with Exhaust Brake;Unlock at slow speed to prevent stall;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If your torque converter isn?t locked up when the exhaust brake is applied, you?re only benefiting from a fraction of its retarding power. The BD AutoLoc commands the torque converter to lock up, and stay locked up, any time the exhaust brake is applied in third and fourth gears. This not only helps with engine braking, but because there?s no clutch slippage, transmission oil temperatures remain low. The lock-up clutch and exhaust brake automatically disengage at low speeds to prevent stalling and transmission/converter damage.

node.sales_desc: N-FAB is the industry leader in quality Nerf-Bars, Pre-Runners and other Off-Road accessories. We design and manufacture the best looking, strongest, and most durable Nerf-Bars available in the industry today. At N-FAB, we are committed to building a heavy duty, high-end, high-quality tubular parts for all the latest trucks and SUV's, even dating back to the 80's. While others are using thinner tube to cut cost, N-Fab still use heavier gauge .084-wall steel, with an welded one-piece construction. We Zinc coat each part for better protection from rust. Lastly, we finish our parts in a thick layer of high gloss powder-coating for a long lasting finish coat. These standards N-Fab lives and breathes far surpass any of our competition.

node.sales_desc: Whether Your racing across Baja or simply traversing your favorite back road, the RS800 Halogen Shock Lamp offers unmatched durability. It's indestructible, with it's high impact resistant polyamide housing, unbreakable polycarbonate hard clear-coated lens, and stout mounting system. Even better, the Shock Lamp features a computer-designed Multi-Surface Reflector with a Twin Color Dual Beam H4 bulb. The result? Legendary PIAA illumination in a package engineered to perform anywhere, in any conditions. Designed for race applications, the PIAA Shock Lamp is not sold as a complete kit. Not recommended for highway use.

node.display_name: PIAA Silicone Windshield Wiper Blade Refills
node.long_desc: Silicone Wipers last up to 2x longer than standard wipers;Coats windshield with water-repellent silicone with every wipe;Refills designed to fit Super Silicone, Aero Vogue, and some OE wiper frames;Available in sizes ranging from 12 up to 28";Rubber claw width is 6mm for sizes 12" up to 22" and 8mm for sizes 24" up to 28;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The wiper insert of all PIAA wiper blades is made of silicone rubber, which ensures greater visibility by coating the windshield with silicone to promote continuous water beading in inclement weather.

Water beads up into droplets at low speeds that are easily removed by ordinary wiping. The silicone coating also reduces drag and eliminates annoying and inefficient chattering, regardless of the shape of the windshield to provide greater comfort for both driver and passenger.

And the best part: PIAA Silicone Wiper Refills reapply the silicone coating every time the wipers are used. Making your wiper blades maintain a sharp, clean edge and offer better resistance to all climates (heat, ozone, ultra-violet) -- clearly out performing the industry standard rubber insert with our legendary durability, as well.

PIAA Silicone wiper refills are designed to fit into PIAA wiper blades. Not all OEM wiper blades will accept our Silicone refills, please measure your wiper claw width before purchasing.

With extended sizes available, PIAA Super Silicone Wipers boast applications for nearly every vehicle on the road. Both both hook and pin applications 3/16 and 1/4" pin styles available."

node.sales_desc: The PIAA Si-Tech (Silicone Technology) Flat Wiper Blade, a modern, frameless design that delivers all-season performance, thanks to PIAA's patented silicone impregnated rubber blades. The key to the PIAA Si-Tech's performance is its frameless design that creates more pressure points across the entire length of the blade for streak-free wiping. Moreover, the design eliminates snow and ice build-up. It is heat and ozone resistant, and its silicone rubber continually reapplies an active silicone coating on the windshield, assuring streak-free, quiet operation.

node.sales_desc: PIAA Trail Light Bars are the perfect mounting solution for today?s most popular trucks and SUVs. Trail bars feature a low profile design and are engineered for easy installation. They go through a rigorous three step coating process, which is one of the most thorough on the market today. The light bars first get a media blast to clean off any impurities, followed by a zinc primer powder coating for additional adhesion. Lastly, a semi-gloss Black Magic powder coating is applied to finish the multi-layer corrosion protection. This makes it one of the most durable and long lasting finishes on the market. The bars have mounting tabs for up to four 9? lights, and are constructed using high quality steel tubing. All bars come complete with mounting brackets, hardware, and installation instructions.

node.sales_desc: Professional installers recommend replacing the brake sensors with the pads because sensors are susceptible to failure with high thermal duty cycling. The Caliper and the Bracket are remanufactured in the USA and treated to a high-temperature red powder-coating. All new premium boots and seals are used, along with high-temperature silicone lubricant on the caliper pins for long life. Premium abutment clips are included where applicable.

node.sales_desc: For vehicles that come with OE semi-metallic pads, Power Stop offers like-for-like replacement brakes manufactured with the same OE positive mold technology. PM18 semi-metallic pads are designed for quick brake response and superior stopping power. PM18 Posi-Mold pads are made with dual layer rubber shims to dampen vibration and eliminate annoying brake squeal. Posi-Mold metallic pads come chamfered and slotted like the original equipment parts. If you prefer semi-metallic pads, PM18 is the best solution for safe and effective brake power.

node.long_desc: Use-as-needed, universal design with dual-sided, non-skid protection;Fast and easy to install, remove, clean and store;Thermoplastic rubber grips the seat, providing added comfort and safety;Woven 600-denier terylene fabric blocks spills, dirt and more;100% waterproof and machine washable (air dry only)
node.sales_desc:
The ARIES Seat Defender is an innovative, universal and use-as-needed seat protection system. Rather than being a permanent cover-up for damaged or unsightly interior, Seat Defender works to stop the damage before it happens. It is easy to install, remove, clean, and store. With its two-sided construction of thermoplastic rubber and 600-denier terylene fabric, the ARIES Seat Defender is a ready defense against muddy clothes, shedding pets, wet swimsuits, messy food and more.

The use-as-needed, universal design offers dual-layer, non-skid protection. The bottom layer of thermoplastic rubber grips the seat to prevent slipping, while the top layer of 600-denier terylene fabric defends against spills, dirt, pet dander and more.

node.long_desc: The Bumper Color is Hammer Black;The Panel Color is Satin Black;Upper mount for a 40 inch light bar;Lower light mount is for a 20 inch;Available with and without a winch mount;All Stealth panels are included;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Addictive Desert Designs was born from an Addiction to push the limits of Design, plus a strong desire for the Desert. This has driven us to pursue our goals of engineering the world's toughest and visually appealing products for Trucks, SUV's and Jeeps.

Started in a garage outside of Phoenix, AZ in 2007 as R & H Longtravel, we are now occupying a 40,000 square foot production facility and corporate office. This new facility is a big leap from the days in that tiny garage, but we continue to lead the way with product development.

From our Industry leading Ford Raptor SVT Bumpers and Suspensions, to our ever growing product line-up for nearly every modern Truck on the market, we are raising the bar on style, ruggedness and performance.

node.long_desc: .120 Wall Steel Main Tube Construction;Laser Cut Panels, Tabs and Plates for a Precise Fit;Direct fit No Cutting or Welding required;Stainless Steel Hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The ADD Logo on the Race Series R" Chase Rack has been redesigned to the new red ADD Logo shown in pictures. The old style logo is no longer available.

From the tracks to your truck, the Addictive Desert Designs Race Series "R" Chase Rack is the total package. This chase rack has inspired styling and maintains a sleek profile. Designed to hold a retractable 50" forward LED bar and cube style rear facing lights this rack is sure to light up the roads while keeping the valuable 50" LED bar safe. This chase rack comes with aluminum panels to keep it light weight and can be customized to a variety of custom color options."

node.long_desc: Hammer Black with Satin Black Powdercoating;Spare Tire Carriers will fit up to a 37 inchTire;Spare Tire Carrier measures 13inch Wide;Laser Cut Panels, Tabs and Plates for a Precise Fit;Direct fit No Cutting or Welding required;Stainless Steel Hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The New Bed Cage for the F-Series Trucks makes getting all of your gear out to the races or weekend on the trail easy, while looking incredible doing it! With multiple mounting options for Fuel Cans and Accessories, these can be tailor made to suit your needs, yet flexible enough to adapt for different adventures. The lockable Toolbox allows for safe storage for all of your trail tools and the optional pull out drawers fit quart just perfectly.

Accessory mounts for 5 Gallon Square Fuel Tanks, Round Dump Cans, Powetank 10 lb. CO2 Inflator Tanks, and Race Jacks. Mix and match to get all of your required items out with you and safely held down in your bed. There are 6 mounting locations for Fuel Tanks, Dump Cans and CO2 Bottles. Only 2 Dump Cans mounts can be used per side due to their larger size, but a CO2 Bottle can be fit with 2 Dump Cans on a side.

node.sales_desc: The Over Cab Chase Rack by Addictive Desert Designs is distinctive in that it hovers over half of the cab for added storage while on your daily adventures. This chase rack is loaded with features and comes with a plethora of light mounts that allow you to light any and all areas you might venture to. Included are mounts for a forward facing 40 LED bar, a rear facing 40" LED bar, and 20" LED bars on each side of the rack. Added to the features is a tire carrier that allows you to hold up to a 37" spare tired, and removable side panels for your customizing needs."

node.display_name: Mountain Off Road Enterprises Body Mount Kits
Trail Gear Axle Housing Bare E-Locker
node.long_desc: This exclusive axle design from Trail Gear is the first in the industry to be released useing all new parts. Trail Gears knuckle balls are forged from 1035 steel, making them much stronger than stock knuckle ever was, eliminating closed or bent knuckle balls. The axle tubes have been offset above the housing centerline, so the inner axles ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. The result is an increase of 3/8in. in ground clearance under the axle tubes. The axle tubes are made from 5/16in. thick 1020 DOM steel tubing with an outer diameter of 3in.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This exclusive axle design from Trail Gear is the first in the industry to be released useing all new parts. Trail Gears knuckle balls are forged from 1035 steel, making them much stronger than stock knuckle ever was, eliminating closed or bent knuckle balls. The axle tubes have been offset above the housing centerline, so the inner axles ride near the bottom of the axle tubes rather than in the center. The result is an increase of 3/8in. in ground clearance under the axle tubes. The axle tubes are made from 5/16in. thick 1020 DOM steel tubing with an outer diameter of 3in.

node.sales_desc: American Force Wheels has been using the latest technologies and finest materials to manufacture custom wheels for North America?s truck enthusiasts. American Force understands that style and function are inseparable and their reputation for design has grown internationally. Aftermarket Companies in search of radical wheel designs for breakthrough vehicles use American Force Wheels. Today American Force Wheels are the finishing touch on dream trucks conceived by custom truck builders. While American Force is proud of their role in vehicle design, their wheels are designed for the real world. All American Force Wheels come with a lifetime warranty against any manufacturing defects.

Hyline Offroad has designed this bumper exactly the same as our Standard Rear Bumper with the exception of including the additional upgrades to allow this model to accept our modular Tire Carrier Assembly to be added at any time.

All Hyline Offroad's bumpers are CNC laser cut, bent, robotically welded, and then finished with rust inhibitive E-Coating and smooth black powder coated. You truly get the best of everything with this bumper.

Proudly Made 100% In USA.

node.long_desc: Designed for the hardcore crawler in mind;Fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen.;D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Plate and welded solid front and back;All bumpers receive a thorough zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, then are E-Coated and Powder Coated with a smooth black finish. ;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Designed for the hardcore crawler in mind this stubby front bumper measures just over 43 inch overall width. This gives you complete unobstructed access to overcome obstacles you may have hit your full width bumper on before. All of our front bumpers come standard with 1/4 inch-20 threaded inserts for mounting your license plate.

This heavy duty bumper is fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen. The D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Plate and welded solid front and back so they can be used as recovery points. All bumpers receive a thorough zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, then are E-Coated and Powder Coated with a smooth black finish.

This bumper is completely Bolt-on, No Drilling Required.

node.display_name: Hyline Offroad Front Recessed Winch Bumpers
node.long_desc: This bumper measures just over 43 inch overall width.;Mounting a winch inside the bumper for maximum air flow through to the radiator;The entire bumper is designed in one formed piece.;Option to install our Air Dam Skid Plate (400.100.180) and/or our Tube Winch Guard (400.100.170).;Fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate;Proudly Made 100% In USA.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Designed for the hardcore crawler in mind this stubby front bumper measures just over 43 inch overall width. This gives you complete unobstructed access to overcome obstacles you may have hit your full width bumper on before. The Hyline Recessed Crawler Front Bumper allows for mounting a winch inside the bumper for maximum air flow through to the radiator and a sleek look. The entire bumper is designed in one formed piece, which makes installation incredibly easy and the bumper extremely strong. The bumper also incorporates aftermarket fog light mounting tabs, winch delete cover plate, and the option to install our Air Dam Skid Plate (400.100.180) and/or our Tube Winch Guard (400.100.170). Another great feature, which is not common with all bumpers, is that you can mount your winch after the bumper is installed on the Jeep.

This heavy-duty bumper is fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen. The D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Plate and welded solid front and back so they can be used as recovery points. All JK Front Bumpers receive a thorough zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, then are E-Coated and Powder Coated with a lightly textured black finish. Our unique textured finish is easy to clean and matches almost perfectly to the black factory fender flares. This bumper is completely Bolt on, No Drilling Required.

*On 2012+ model Wranglers, a vacuum canister relocation kit may be needed, depending on the size of your winch.

node.long_desc: 50 Inch LED Aluminum Light Bar;3/16 inch aluminum;One piece construction;No drilling or other modification is necessary for installation.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Hyline Offroad 50 inch LED Aluminum Light Bar Mounts allow you to easily install a 50 inch LED Light Bar above your windshield. The Light Bar Mounts are manufactured using 3/16 inch thick rust proof aluminum, laser cut and formed using a CNC precision press brake. They are designed as one piece construction with no weld seams for a smooth finished cosmetic look. No drilling or other modification is necessary for installation. They simply bolt to the windshield mounts using the factory hardware. Precision cut Rubber Gasket liners are included with the light bar mounts to protect your vehicles paint from scuffing and vibrating. The brackets are shipped without any finish. You can paint them any color or just leave them bare aluminum. Either way you don't have to worry about any rusting issues for years/miles down the road.

node.long_desc: Designed with a fully recessed, fully integrated winch plate;This bumper incorporates factory fog light cutouts and mounts;Fully welded shackle mounts;An integrated recessed winch plate;The option to install our Air Dam Skid Plate and/or our Tube Winch Guard.;Includes all Grade 8 mounting hardware;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The new mid width JK front winch bumper has arrived! The new Hyline Offroad mid-width front bumper is designed with a fully recessed, fully integrated winch plate and is about 6 inch shorter on it's overall width than a full size bumper. The recessed winch plate keeps your radiator free and clear to allow adequate airflow.

It is designed for the everyday Jeep enthusiast that enjoys the mid width style, but also stands up to anything the toughest trail can throw at it. The bumper incorporates factory fog light cutouts and mounts, as well as integrated tabs to mount aftermarket fog/driving lamps, fully welded shackle mounts, an integrated recessed winch plate, and the option to install our Air Dam Skid Plate and/or our Tube Winch Guard.

Another great feature, which is not common with all bumpers, is that you can mount your winch after the bumper is installed on the Jeep. If you will not be running a winch right away our bumper kit includes a winch delete plate. The plate is flat and fills the void of where the winch would be and can be easily bolted on and off.

This heavy-duty bumper is fabricated using USA Grade 3/16 inch Steel Plate, laser cut, CNC formed, robotically welded, and hand finished by craftsmen. The D-Ring mounts are 5/8 inch Thick Plate and welded solid front and back so they can be used as recovery points.

All JK Front Bumpers receive a thorough zinc phosphate rinse and cleaning, then are E-Coated and Powder Coated with a lightly textured black finish. Our unique textured finish is easy to clean and matches almost perfectly to the black factory fender flares. This bumper is completely Bolt on, No Drilling Required.

*On 2012+ model Wranglers, a vacuum canister relocation kit may be needed, depending on the size of your winch.

node.long_desc: All brackets are E-Coated;Top coated with smooth black powder coat;100% visibility of the mirror on the passenger side;Designed for use with or without your doors;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Our Mirror Relocation Brackets are designed for use with or without your doors. Unlike other mirror relocation brackets our design gives you 100% visibility of the mirror on the passenger side. The mirror brackets also include an optional accessory/offroad light mount. This is a bolt on bracket that can either be mounted or left off.

node.display_name: Hyline Offroad Air Dam for Front Bumpers
node.long_desc: The Air Dam Skid Plate replaces the flimsy plastic factory air dam.;Our Air Dam Skid Plate is completely bolt on with no drilling or other modification necessary.;Includes 1 air dam skid plate and all required mounting hardware.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Air Dam Skid Plate replaces the flimsy plastic factory air dam. It not only adds a nice finished look to the Hyline JK Front Bumpers (400.100.100, 400.100.110, 400.100.120 & 400.100.130), but also serves as a skid plate to protect low hanging frame bar.

Our Air Dam Skid Plate is completely bolt on with no drilling or other modification necessary. Unlike other aftermarket air dam product designs our are made using thick 10 Ga. (.135) steel with welded and ground end caps, again for a more finished look and added strength.

As with all of our JK products the Air Dam Skid Plates are finished with protective E-Coating and lightly textured black semi gloss powder coat.

node.long_desc: Trail Gear?s Hi-Lift Jack Mount is laser cut from 3/16? thick steel and then CNC formed. The ends of the mount are coped so that they can be welded to 1-3/4 inch tubing. We use a 1/2 inch thick bolt that has a precision hole drilled into it so that a hair-pin/cotter style pin can be inserted. This will keep the nut from rattling off and ensure that you never lose your hi-lift jack on the trail. We also added rubber pads that go between the jack and the mounts and a Velcro strap to hold the handle in place so that no vibration will be heard from any of the mounting locations. A second hole was placed on the mount so that you can put a padlock on the hi-lift to keep it totally secure from loss or theft. Product is shipped unpainted, must be welded on.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Rigid Industries SR-M2 Series LED Driving Light
node.long_desc: Rigid Industries High & Low Dual Function LED Lights provide the option of high or low intensity LED lighting to suit any environment. These lights feature a three-wire harness, and the low, high, or off three-position rocker switch which gives you the option of running at full intensity on high power or 20% intensity on low power. The Rigid Industries High & Low Dual Function LED Lights feature a thermally engineered oversized heat sink that provides the cooling power to deliver the 50,000-hour lifespan. With its unbreakable polycarbonate lens, durable UV-resistant powder-coat and patented optics, the High & Low Function LED Lights are the total lighting solution. Torture Tested and Approved.;California Residents: WARNING"

Its deep, widely spaced tread bars shed mud easily to provide traction and it?s 4 or 6-ply construction ratings provide extra puncture resistance giving you the confidence you need when conquering the trail.

node.long_desc: Advanced construction and tread design to deliver maximum traction and control;Bullet proof reputation on the trail;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Pro Comp has been a leader in off road and light truck tires for years. Extensive tire testing and development went into producing the best performing off road tires available. Pro Comp has a bullet proof reputation on the trail, race track and street. The new UTV tires features advanced construction and tread design to deliver maximum traction and control.

node.long_desc: 6-ply;Radial construction;More consistent and larger contact patch;Reduces shock to provide smooth ride;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Radial construction provides larger contact patch for exceptional traction. Outstanding shock absorption provides smooth ride and minimizes handlebar feedback. Excellent braking and predictable sliding characteristics. Lightweight, durable 6 ply-rated construction. Improved tread pattern based on legendary Maxxis Razr lines. Tested and approved by Bill Ballance, most decorated GNCC ATV racer of all time.

node.long_desc: Rounded shoulder knobs offer the rider predictable sliding characteristics;Compound is formulated specifically for ATV MX racing applications;Maxxis' proprietary #397 soft compound is designed for optimal traction in hardpack race conditions;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Maxxis Razr MX is designed for the most challenging motocross conditions. The tread design is similar to the Maxxis Razr tire, only with a softer compound for optimal traction in race conditions. It has an aggressive centerline and less rounded profile that provides excellent steering and handling.

node.long_desc: Larger contact patch for better acceleration;Increased ride comfort;Precise, responsive steering while reducing bump steer and minimizing braking bumps;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Get great acceleration and precise steering along with a comfortable ride: The Razr iMX provides superior traction in intermediate to loamy conditions, while the small knob design allows for customization to specific tracks.

node.long_desc: Developed by Maxxis specifically for hardcore ATV MX riders;Ideal tire choice for intermediate track conditions;Angled tread knobs on rear tire offer excellent traction while allowing controlled slides for cornering;Front tire combines aggressive center line tread with angled outer knobs for precise steering, straight-line stability and improved braking;Tread design provides the ability to customize knob configuration for individual track conditions;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Maxxis RAZR Cross is the newest addition to the RAZR line-up. Get exactly what you need for ATV motocross with the RAZR Cross. Small knob design allows the rider to cut a specific tread pattern to match racing conditions. Great for intermediate to hard terrain.

node.long_desc: Aggressive tread pattern for enhanced cornering ability;Increased lug depth offers increased skid and traction control for loose cross country or desert conditions;Raised yellow lettering on the sidewall;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Maxxis Razr2's have an aggressive tread pattern for even more impressive cornering ability. They feature raised yellow lettering on the side wall and are suitable for all types of cross country terrain. Increased lug depth offers increased skid and traction control.

node.long_desc: Laboratory-tested and competition-proven in the most demanding national championship cross country series;Knobs extend across the tread surface area for a large contact patch that maximizes traction;Specially formulated racing compound delivers superior traction while extending tread life;Solid knob design improves traction and reduces tread squirm;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Razr is competition-proven and performs best when pushed to the limit in all terrain types. Razr's solid knob design improves traction and reduces tread squirm. The Maxxis RAZR Rear Tire features the same puncture resistant design as the front tire, but with a wider profile for instant traction and increased grip during acceleration and braking.

node.long_desc: Extremely lightweight design provides quicker acceleration and mudslinging traction with great braking power;Nearly continuous center tread for smoother ride on trails;Predictable high-speed performance;Durable 6-ply rating;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Zilla tire is quickly becoming one of our most popular tires! Maxxis continues to push the envelope with their all new Zilla tire. The Zilla is hands down one of the lightest mud-tires on the market! Go ahead and compare the weights! It features an aggressive tread that pulls well, yet wont beat you up on the trails, bog your machine down with excess tire weight, or break your wallet.

node.display_name: Coyote Enterprises Internal Boltless Beadlock Wheels
node.long_desc: Tire within a tire;Street legal;Wheel size specific;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Coyote Enterprises Internal Boltless Beadlock is a tire within a tire. It divides the tires air chamber into two separate compartments and thus has two valve stems. One is for the tire and the other for the beadlock. Think of the beadlock Case as a mini-tire and hence its parts are named the same. There is a Tread, two Sidewalls and two Beads. A heavy duty inner tube within the beadlock Case forces the Case to take shape and do its job. The inner tube is inflated up to 50 PSI and forces/pinches both tire beads against the wheel. There are several advantages over conventional, mechanical beadlocks. You can use your existing wheels. They lock both the outside and inside tire beads to the wheel. This prevents the inside tire bead from burping air. There are no balance issues. There are no DOT issues, hence they are street legal. The bead locks are wheel size specific, but regarding the tires, no. If kept properly inflated, the beadlock will last you through many sets of tires. Internal bead locks are being used in drag race vehicles in excess of 150 MPH and have been on the Baja 1000 Jeep Speed class winner for several years. They have also been on Paris to Dakar and Outback Challenge winning vehicles throughout the world. There is a 1 year limited warranty on material and workmanship.

node.long_desc: An all inclusive package to give your Wrangler the off road capability you need;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The JK Adventure Package for the 2007-2013 Jeep Wrangler JK is a hassle free, all inclusive package to give your Wrangler the off road capability and the correct fitment wheel and tire set all in one package.

node.long_desc: Wheel features a super-strong reinforced inner bead lip;Slik-Kote finish option looks good and sheds mud;Colored rings available to match your vehicle;Ring mounts easily and with tight tolerance to wheel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: STI Pro-Lite Beadlock wheels utilize heavy-duty .170 wall construction to provide maximum strength and minimum rotating mass. This lightweight, rugged wheel is then beautifully polished to a mirror-like finish or topped with a satin black powdercoat. This beadlock wheel features a conical (tapered) outer lock ring design which allows for easier tire installation and is mounted with durable, flush, pan-head Allen bolts.

node.long_desc: The STI Pro-Lite Alloy wheel has the highest performance for a most reasonable price;Spun aluminum wheel;Manufactured with the latest high-tech production;Utilizes heavy-duty .170 wall construction;Lightweight, rugged wheel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: High performance is now available at a reasonable price with the introduction of the STI Pro-Lite spun aluminum wheel line. This is the wheel sport ATV riders have been waiting for. Pro-Lite wheels are manufactured with the latest high-tech production equipment and utilize heavy-duty .170 wall construction to provide maximum strength and minimum rotating mass. This lightweight, rugged wheel is then beautifully polished to a mirror-like finish or topped with a satin black powdercoat. With the Pro-Lite, dependable high performance does not come at a high cost.

node.long_desc: Wheel features a super-strong reinforced inner bead lip;Slik-Kote finish option looks good and sheds mud;Colored rings available to match your vehicle;Ring mounts easily and with tight tolerance to wheel;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: STI Tire & Wheel has stepped up tire security with the introduction of the all-new HD Beadlock. This innovative one-piece alloy wheel is about much more than its beadlock ring design, however. The HD Beadlock brings numerous features and benefits to this wheel market. What makes the HD Beadlock unique is its creative integral-mount beadlock ring, which is quick to install and engineered to reduce debris buildup. A beadlock wheel configuration makes tire mounting simple and adds considerable strength to the outer lip. Most importantly, the ring helps ensure the tire bead stays on the wheel, even when using lower pressures and applying high side loading. The HD Beadlock is not just for racing. It?s priced right for budget-minded enthusiasts who want to step up to the performance benefits of a beadlock wheel.

node.long_desc: Features unique inner and outer wheel lip reinforcement;Considerably stronger than its competition;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Sport Alloy features unique inner and outer wheel lip reinforcement, making it considerably stronger than its competition while remaining surprisingly light in weight.

node.long_desc: Combines innovative 8-spoke design;Features eye-catching style, and it?s value-priced for today?s consumer;Durable matte black finish with bright machined accents, topped with a tough matte clear coat;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The STI HD2 combines innovative 8-spoke design features with eye-catching style, and it?s value-priced for today?s consumer. This is an industry-first 12?7 OEM offset wheel for the Polaris RZR. All HD2 wheels use a durable matte black finish with bright machined accents, topped with a tough matte clear coat. A matching HD logo wheel cap is included with every wheel. The HD2 is as strong as it is attractive, boasting load ratings of 700 lb. for the 12-inch size, 800 lb. for the 14-inch models, and 1000 lb. for the 15?7 wheel.

node.long_desc: Heavy-duty construction adds to its innovation;Advanced one-piece alloy wheel;Features both inner and outer wheel lip reinforcement;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: STI Tire & Wheel is bringing a new level of innovation to the ATV/UTV aftermarket with the launch of the HD1 wheel. What sets this model apart is its unique non-stick, Slik-Kote finish, which sheds mud like no wheel before. This high-tech, rugged, deep gray finish reduces mud and debris buildup and resulting unsprung weight, which can compromise the machine?s power, handling and ride. It also makes post-ride cleanup exceptionally easy. The HD1 wheel?s heavy-duty construction adds to its innovation. This advanced one-piece alloy wheel features both inner and outer wheel lip reinforcement. Most wheels in this class use only outer lip reinforcement.

node.sales_desc: King bump stops provide an additional level of bottoming control when you are using every bit of suspension travel available. We offer 2.0 and 2.5 inch diameter bodies with stroke lengths from 2 to 4 inches to fit any mounting location requirements and handle any suspension arresting loads. Our 4130 Chromoly mounting sleeves are precision machined to size and offer a secure and sturdy mount without pinching the bump stop body. Our unique Schrader cover mounts to the housing not the Schrader valve itself to protect it and acts as a double seal to keep dust and moisture out. Our bump stops contain a unique piston design that offers superior flow characteristics and the same quality micro polished shafts and advanced seal technology as our race shocks. Our long wearing nylon contact pad insures quiet operation and mounts with a simple yet effective single bolt design.King bump stops help you use all the suspension travel you have to get the most out of your vehicle. They are easily tuned and serviced with simple hand tools. You really need to experience the comfort and control a set of King bump stops provide. Nothing rides like King.

node.long_desc: JK Specific tuned for high-speed performance;Simple installation no welding required;Quiet movement & function (no pad-slap clunk);Absorbs large impact energy progressively during compression to prevent bent axle tubes;Maintenance-free, all composite construction;Resistant to all types of environmental conditions (mud, salt, sand, dust, etc.);Compatible w/ all suspension systems that retain factory axle spring mounting locations;Subzero temperature flexibility reduces fatigue;Patented technology;Limited lifetime warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: These innovative TeraFlex SpeedBump Bump Stops meet the demand of high-performance driving. Composite construction combined with a progressive nature reduces suspension compression impacts and harshness when bottoming out whether driving off-road or on poorly maintained highways. Reducing this impact increases driver ability to maintain vehicle control as well as reduces the risk of bending an axle housing tube. Other features include performance-tuned closed-cell nitrogen charged microcellular polyurethane technology that will not fade or dissipate under extended heavy use to maintain its progressive nature. This material is unaffected by temperature extremes and retains its flexibility under thermal or sub-zero temperatures. SpeedBump Bump Stops also feature a self-lubricating Delrin acetal resin polymer shaft to withstand 1,000s of continuous cycles without wear or abrasion. The external shaft seal also prolongs shaft life by wiping and cleaning the shaft to prevent contaminants from entering the SpeedBump housing. The front bump stops feature a simple bolt-on installation simply requires removal of the factory bump stop bell with no welding required.Additionally, these maintenance-free SpeedBump Bump Stops don't require any adjustment or tuning.

node.long_desc: We are happy to introduce our new GM Style Alternator Bracket Kit. This bracket kit will allow you to bolt a GM style 1 wire alternator to your 20R, 22R or 22RE motor with no major modifications, and it works with your stock alternator belt. This kit will allow you to say goodbye to the small underpowered OEM Toyota alternator and upgrade to a GM style unit that will supply ample power for your rock lights, stereo, GPS and all the other gadgets that are required for modern day rock crawling and racing.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: We are happy to introduce our new GM Style Alternator Bracket Kit. This bracket kit will allow you to bolt a GM style 1 wire alternator to your 20R, 22R or 22RE motor with no major modifications, and it works with your stock alternator belt. This kit will allow you to say goodbye to the small underpowered OEM Toyota alternator and upgrade to a GM style unit that will supply ample power for your rock lights, stereo, GPS and all the other gadgets that are required for modern day rock crawling and racing.

node.display_name: Trail Gear Frame Plate/IFS Box Mount Kits
node.long_desc: If you plan on doing or have already performed a solid axle conversion on your early model '95 1/2 to 2004 Tacoma, then you will need our Taco Frame Plate/IFS Box Mount kit. This kit not only provides your frame with a 3/16 inch steel brace from the VIN number stamp to the body mount, but incorporated into that brace is the strongest IFS box mount on the market. The box mount will allow you to install an IFS steering box from an '86-'95 1/2 Hilux Toyota while making your frame much stronger than stock and giving you a solid place to weld your shock hoops.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: If you plan on doing or have already performed a solid axle conversion on your early model '95 1/2 to 2004 Tacoma, then you will need our Taco Frame Plate/IFS Box Mount kit. This kit not only provides your frame with a 3/16 inch steel brace from the VIN number stamp to the body mount, but incorporated into that brace is the strongest IFS box mount on the market. The box mount will allow you to install an IFS steering box from an '86-'95 1/2 Hilux Toyota while making your frame much stronger than stock and giving you a solid place to weld your shock hoops.

node.sales_desc: Designed by a dedicated team of Jeep enthusiasts, the ORV suspension program is one of the most complete programs available. We have looked at each application in detail to provide the very best and most complete solution for your specific Jeep model. Since we focus the large majority of our attention on Jeep vehicles, we know the ins and outs of what the best lift solution is depending on your individual needs. As one of your most complete kits on the market, these are not your entry-level lift kits. All springs are made of ductile iron (memory metal) and are shot-peaned for additional strength. All shocks are nitro charged with self-adjusting valving for a smoother ride on and off the road. Remember, all ORV Kits with shocks include a pair of neoprene wrapped grab handles and an Off Road Organizer for your glove box!

node.sales_desc: Introducing the brand new Trail Rocker from Painless, allowing you to control up to eight accessories on your JK Jeep! The heart of this kit is enclosed in the weatherproof housing that surrounds the power center with eight fuses and relays. Controlling it, are five prewired switches mounted in our custom dash panel for a clean factory installed look inside your Jeep. The power center then provides you with all the necessary weatherproof connectors and wiring to connect to your Jeep accessories ranging from lights to air lockers. Easily installed with our detailed instructions and plug-n-play design. Provided are 5 switches pre-wired to control 6 accesories with ease! node.long_desc: Keyed start;6 toggles;18 feet of wire;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
These new switch panels are the only panels to consider if your vehicle will be subject to harsh outdoor conditions. They feature a formed polyethylene liner to seal the face plate to the dash or chassis, creating a water-resistant seal. The panel includes a keyed ignition switch for added security. All switches and circuits are protected by weather resistant boots, and all circuits are protected with circuit breakers. These kits are shipped unassembled with peel and stick labels for custom applications.

node.sales_desc: The 2.5 inch Lift system for 2014 3500 Rams, with Radius Arm front suspension, features more than just basic spacers. Dodge designed the front coil springs with a large bow to increase vehicle stability and handling. Unlike other flat spacers on the market, Fabtech?s angled spacers retain this important feature preserving the factory ride characteristics. The front shocks are replaced with longer length units to allow for full suspension travel while improving the damping of the front suspension. Extended length bump stops are included in this kit to prevent the coil springs from binding at full compression while also eliminating Trac Bar interference. Use 315/70R17 tires w/ 17x9 wheels w/ 4 5/8? BS w/ minor trimming. Use 325/65R18 tires w/ 18x9 wheels w/ 4 5/8? BS w/ minor trimming. Use 325/60R20 tires w/ 20x9.5 wheels w/ 5? BS w/ minor trimming.

node.long_desc: Converts factory 4 link to Fabtech's Radius Arm Design;Adjustable Radius Arm Links are made of 5/16 inch thick steel;Dropped Pitman Arm Included;Multiple Lift Kits for Jeeps available;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: For the extreme off-roader and rock crawler, Fabtech offers the Crawler system. This system will allow use of 37 inch tires for aggressive offroading. The front system is a conversion from the factory 4 link to Fabtech's Radius Arm design. The adjustable Radius Arm links are made of 5/16 inch thick steel for max dent resistance with rotational urethane joints at each end for unrestricted articulation. These Radius Arms mount to a 1/4 inch thick steel crossmember that bolts to the frame under the transmission. The front steering geometry is relocated via a dropped pitman arm. A Trac Bar relocation bracket keeps the arc of travel between the Trac Bar and Drag Link proper to reduce bump steer throughout the suspension travel.Front lift is achieved by either coil springs or coilovers. The rear system retains the factory 5 Link design but with extended length lower tubular arms that bolt to new side frame brackets. The upper links are replaced as well with a tubular style in the factory mounts. Both upper and lower links feature 5/16 inch thick wall links with adjustable rotational urethane ends. The rear Trac Bar is relocated to keep the rear axle tracking with the front axle for superior road handling at high speed. For increased ground clearance at the rear axle, we provide replacement shock mounts that allow trimming of the factory mounts. This allows an additional 1 inch of ground clearance over the factory mounts. We offer heavy duty replacement driveshafts to be used with this system. Exhaust modification required. Use 37/12.50R17 tires w/ 17x8.5 wheels w/ 5? BS w/ minor trimming

node.sales_desc: The ARIES Big Horn bull bar has been called a big, fat slob by more slender, less considerate bull bars. Although, when these other bull bars say inchbig inch, they are only commenting on the impressive 4 inch diameter and strong, lightweight aluminum construction of the Big Horn. When they say inchfat inch, they can only mean inchp.h.a.t. inch (that is, inchpretty hot and tempting inch), referring to the Big Horn's highly textured powder coat finish and aggressive skid plate design. And when they say inchslob inch, who knows? Maybe they are jealous that the ARIES Big Horn bull bar has been known to spend over half its life out on the trails, covered in mud. Thank you for the compliment, other bull bars.

node.long_desc: Husky Floor Liners Classic Style Floor Liners provide complete front to back protection for your carpet;Made from tough and durable patented rubberized material these floor liners are resistant to most chemicals and helps to minimizes cargo shifting;The unique Sta-Put nibs on the bottom keeps the mats securely in place and stops them from sliding out of the way;Their tray-like design contains more spills and mess while providing better coverage and protection than factory floor mats;Proudly designed and manufactured in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
The Original Floor Liner - Our Classic Style Liners set the mold for auto floor protection. Featuring our rugged diamond plate look and FormFit design, these classic liners offer protection for vehicles dating all the way back to the 1970s.

Form is our function - Our FormFit Design process perfectly forms each liner to the detailed contours of your specific ride. How? Well, our Nerds use lasers and computers to precisely measure each individual make and model's floorboard to create the perfect fit.

Put your liner on lockdown - Our StayPut Cleats help keep the liner from shifting around underfoot like lesser liners.

Tough to beat - Our Classic Liners durable tread plate design and rugged material lasts forever. It can stand up to abuse like no other.

Guaranteed...FOR LIFE - When we say it's guaranteed for life" that is exactly what we mean. No hassles, no guff. If you have a problem, we'll replace it.

Designed and Manufactured in the USA - We pledge allegiance to the Flag of the United States of America, and to the Republic for which it stands, one Nation under God, indivisible, with Liberty and Justice for all. Need we say more?"

node.long_desc: Jeep rocker panel with fender to fender protection;Innovative rails feature an armor plate that mounts to the body,under the pinch rails, and up the side for added protection;Welded 1 3/4 in. tub rail gives extra off-road protection;Cleanout zone to help with getting trail debris from behind the rail;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Extreme Rock Rails were engineered with the enthusiast that wants the maximum protection for his Jeep. The back plate is manufactured from 3/16 inch steel plate. The Extreme Rock Rails are designed to maximize body protection while maximizing ground clearance. We added a 1.75 inch diameter .120 wall kick-out tube which works as a rub rail. They also work great as a step. Installation required drilling holes into the tub to secure the top of the plate to the body. They also attach to underside of the rocker panel for full wrap around protection. They are painted with our dual process textured black powder coat finish.

It is designed for horizontal style tow bars and is sold as a set of 2. To select the correct tow bar adapter please determine if the tow bar attaching bolt is vertically positioned or horizontally to the ground. This would be the same bolt as the smaller bolt in the adapter. The large bolt is used to attach the adapter to the Body Armor bumper and that will always be horizontal to the ground.

node.sales_desc: Light weight. Durable. Affordable. All these things come to mind when thinking of our Performance Winch from Rugged Ridge.
